show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
What is l-carnitine and why is it important in heart disease? <!--more--> What kinds of stresses increase the risk for a heart attack?
Why reducing complications may costs hospitals money Why don’t doctors care much about medical costs?
How do doctors learn about new drugs?
Vicki’s 20-20 tips include: The key to preventing moldy berries Psychiatrists vs bartenders
